name: Shinkai: Download Pages and Save as Markdown
description: Downloads one or more URLs, converts their HTML content to Markdown, and saves the content in a SQLite database.
author: Shinkai

sqlTables.name: downloaded_content
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE downloaded_content (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, url TEXT NOT NULL, content TEXT NOT NULL, created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

sqlQueries.name: Get content by URL
sqlQueries.query: SELECT * FROM downloaded_content WHERE url = :url ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
